column2: SELECT id, fname, lname, town, hobby FROM studenter ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, namn, YHP, beskrivning FROM kurser ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT s.id, s.fname, s.lname, k.namn, k.YHP, k.beskrivning FROM studenter s JOIN narvaro n ON n.studentID=s.id JOIN kurser k ON k.id=n.kursID WHERE s.fname='{0}' AND s.lname='{1}' AND s.id='{2}' ORDER BY s.id ASC
SELECT s.id, s.fname, s.lname, k.namn, k.YHP, k.beskrivning FROM studenter s JOIN narvaro n ON n.studentID=s.id JOIN kurser k ON k.id=n.kursID WHERE s.fname='{0}' AND s.lname='{1}' ORDER BY s.id ASC
SELECT c.id, c.name, c.YHP, c.description FROM students s JOIN students_courses sc ON sc.students_id=s.id JOIN courses c ON c.id=sc.courses_id WHERE s.id='{0}' ORDER BY s.id ASC

SELECT s.fName, s.lName, t.fName, t.lName, c.name FROM students s JOIN students_courses sc ON sc.students_id=s.id JOIN teachers_courses tc ON sc.courses_id=tc.courses_id JOIN courses c ON c.id=sc.courses_id  JOIN teachers t ON t.id=tc.teachers_id WHERE c.id='{0}' ORDER BY s.id ASC

SELECT c.name, s.fName, s.lName, t.fName, t.lName  FROM students s JOIN students_courses sc ON sc.students_id=s.id LEFT JOIN teachers_courses tc ON sc.courses_id=tc.courses_id LEFT JOIN courses c ON c.id=sc.courses_id  LEFT JOIN teachers t ON t.id=tc.teachers_id WHERE c.id='{0}' ORDER BY s.id ASC
INSERT INTO studenter (fname, lname, town, hobby) VALUES (?,?,?,?)
Select * FROM students s WHERE s.username='{0}' AND s.password='{1}'
Select * FROM teachers t WHERE t.username='{0}' AND t.password='{1}'
SELECT username, password FROM users s WHERE s.username='{0}' AND s.password='{1}' ORDER BY s.id ASC
